description: Whiskey and pomegranate is a match made in heaven, or at least; it can be with the Belmont Jewel. These two flavors go perfectly together because of their sweet taste that balances out any spiciness from whiskey while complementing its flavor nicely with some tartness from lemonade mix too!
name: Belmont Jewel
recipeIngredient: Lemon wedge, orange zest, or ​cherry, for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker filled with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker filled with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake well to combine the ingredients.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake well to combine the ingredients.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain over fresh ice on desired glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Strain over fresh ice on desired glass.
